DataElement.preferredName: I-PSS 7 Past Week How Many Times Typically Get Up to Urinate During Nighttime Sleep Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent how many times over the past week a person got up to urinate from bedtime until the time they got up in the morning.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: International Prostate Symptom Score Past Week How Many Times Typically Get Up to Urinate During Nighttime Sleep Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A screening tool used to screen for, diagnose, track, and manage the symptoms of benign prostatic hyperplasia._The most recent week. May include the present day._A question about the most typical number of times an individual has or had to get up to urinate from the time they went to bed at night until the time they got up in the morning._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A screening tool used to screen for, diagnose, track, and manage the symptoms of benign prostatic hyperplasia.

Concepts.definition: A screening tool used to screen for, diagnose, track, and manage the symptoms of benign prostatic hyperplasia.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

Concepts.definition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A natural number greater than 3 and less than 5 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of three and one.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 3 and less than 5 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of three and one.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one.: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.: Greater in size, amount, extent, or degree.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: signs that a person has a condition or disease. Some examples of symptoms are headache, fever, fatigue, nausea, vomiting, and pain(NCI).

ReferenceDocuments.name: Over the past week, how many
ReferenceDocuments.description: Over the past week, how many times did you most typically get up to urinate from the time you went to bed at night until the time you got up in the morning?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. In cases where retaining the question set intact to preserve the validity and reliability are not as important as advancing the science, questions may be used individually or in combination with other measure questions.

DataElement.changeDescription: Created for Alliance per K. Laumann - smt
